History¶

1.1.0 (2023-07-31)¶

Added a ‘Manual actions’ menu that allows the user to manually blind or unblind names. This is helpful when the automatic blinding/unblinding does not replace a blinded name in an additional data file, and you can’t find its matching ‘doubleblind_encoding’ file.

1.0.1 (2023-07-11)¶

Fixed bug that prevented the stand-alone app from launching.

1.0.0 (2023-07-02)¶

First stable release.
